import React from 'react'; import "./Footer.css" import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; const Footer = () => { const [t] = useTranslation('global') return (

Segui nuestros avances en redes

{t('footer.title2')}

{t('footer.text3')}

{t('footer.text4')}
) } export default Footer
